meta.title: Online Trading with Smart Investment App | Capital.com

meta.name: description
meta.content: Try online trading with an easy-to-use and smart tool. Discover investment opportunities with CFDs on leading financial markets. Find trading insights, in-depth educational materials and comprehensive financial analyses, and stay on top of the financial news, all at your fingertips. Your capital is at risk.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: 📊 Trading has never looked so beautiful. Trade over 2,000 of the world's biggest markets like the DAX 30, gold and Apple shares in one app with Capital.com's award-winning platform. The best part? Become a better trader with eQ, an AI-powered trading bias detection system. Your capital is at risk.

📊 Trading has never looked so beautiful. Trade over 2,000 of the world's biggest markets like the DAX 30, gold and Apple shares in one app with Capital.com's award-winning platform. The best part? Become a better trader with eQ, an AI-powered trading bias detection system. Your capital is at risk.

div.script: function pageReady3(){ var iwrap = $('#tools'); $('.tab-list__item', iwrap).on('click', function(e){ $('.active.tab-list__item', iwrap).removeClass('active'); $(this).addClass('active'); $('.tools__list', iwrap).addClass('hidden'); var type = $(this).data('type'); $('[data-iid]', iwrap).removeAttr('data-iid'); $('.ihome-' + type, iwrap).children('[data-iid-tmp]').each(function(){ $(this).attr('data-iid', $(this).data('iid-tmp')); }); livePricesunSubscribe(); livePricesSubscribe(); $('.ihome-' + type, iwrap).removeClass('hidden').children().first().click(); $('.view-btn-wrap > .button-link').addClass('hidden'); $('.view-btn-wrap > .button-link.ihome-' + type).removeClass('hidden'); e.preventDefault(); return false; }); var activeFrame = "D1"; var activeMarket = "427748677997764"; $('[data-frame]', iwrap).on('click', function(){ var f = $(this).data('frame'); if(f){ $('.active[data-frame]', iwrap).removeClass('active'); $(this).addClass('active'); activeFrame = f; upadateChart(); } }); $('[data-iid],[data-iid-tmp]', iwrap).on('click', function(){ var iid = $(this).data('iid'); iid = iid ? iid : $(this).data('iid-tmp'); if(iid){ $('.active[data-iid],.active[data-iid-tmp]', iwrap).removeClass('active'); $(this).addClass('active'); activeMarket = iid; upadateChart(); } }); var chartWrap = $('#chartWrap'); $(window).on('resize', function(){ if(chartWrap.parent().width()<600){ chartWrap.parent().height(200) }else{ chartWrap.parent().height(115) } chart && chart.resize(); }).resize(); upadateChart(); /* --------------- charts -------------------- */ function upadateChart(){ var path = pURL + "/trading/v1/quoteHistory"; $.ajax({ url: path, type: "POST", data: JSON.stringify({ depth: 365, instrumentId: activeMarket, timeframe: activeFrame, }), dataType: "json", contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8", error: function(){ }, success: function(d){ if(d && d.history){ fillChart(d.history); } } }); }; var chart; function fillChart(data){ var chartData = data.map(function(d){ return { t: d.timestamp*1000, y: d.close }; }); var timeUnits = { unit: (activeFrame == "D1" || activeFrame == "W1") ? 'month' : (activeFrame == "M30") ? 'hour' : 'day', displayFormats: { hour: 'MMM D, HH:mm' } }; if(chart){ chart.options.scales.xAxes[0].time = timeUnits; chart.data.datasets[0].data = chartData; chart.update(); }else{ var cfg = { type: 'bar', data: { datasets: [{ backgroundColor: "#F8FEFA", borderColor: "#40B0EE", data: chartData, type: 'line', pointRadius: 0, pointBorderWidth: 0, pointHoverRadius:0, pointHoverBorderWidth:0, fill: false, lineTension: 0, borderWidth: 2, }] }, options: { maintainAspectRatio: false, responsive: true, tooltips: { enabled: false }, scales: { xAxes: [{ gridLines: { drawBorder: false, display: false, zeroLineWidth: 0, }, type: 'time', time: timeUnits, distribution: 'series', ticks: { source: 'data', autoSkip: true, autoSkipPadding: 20, padding:0, minRotation: 0, maxRotation: 0, fontColor: "#8a8b93", }, }], yAxes: [{ gridLines: { drawBorder: false, drawTicks: false, borderDash: [3,10], zeroLineWidth: 0, }, ticks: { padding:7, fontColor: "#8a8b93", }, display: true, position: "right", scaleLabel: { display: false, } }] }, legend: { display: false }, } }; chart = new Chart(document.getElementById("chartWrap"), cfg); } }; }

div.h2: Enjoy our award-winning online trading platform
div.p: Major global markets at your fingertips. Trade wherever you are, whenever you want to. It has never been more accessible.

div.div: Trade with confidence

br.p: We care about you and your safety. 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

div.p: Trust
Authorized and Regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and by the Cyprus Security and Exchange Commission.
Security
Your funds are safe and sound, kept in segregated bank accounts and protected by industry-leading security protocols.
Privacy
Capital.com is fully compliant with PCI Data Security Standards. We encrypt and protect your information, so you never need to worry.
Ready to get started?
We deliver quality. You enjoy the opportunities.
Ready to get started?
We deliver quality. You enjoy the opportunities.

div.p: If your looking for a professional and experienced traders. Look no further. Been with many trading companies. Now finally I've found Capital.Com. Your money will always be safe for you to access anytime you feel. 10 out of 10 for this company. Would highly recommend them. Especially ask for Aleks, my trading manager.
04 April 2019

I am rating this for the team,as very friendly when communicating with you,and was not pushy when I was debating if I should or should not sign up.They also was very helpful in explaining how to trade on their site.
03 April 2019
Very reliable and fast with simple design
23 April 2018
I’m new to trading and am happy to have stumbled across Capital.com. The basics are explained very well, and will hopefully keep trading with them for a while.
19 April 2018
Depositing and withdrawing were extremely fast. Outstanding service
26 April 2018
Capital.com have very friendly staff, their support team is very polite
07 March 2018
Very good coverage of important market events and consistently friendly mailout communication
15 February 2018
I recommend their web platform. It has technical indicators. It took me a while to learn to use them, but they are worth it.
10 April 2018
Your educational content is very comprehensive. Good for beginners.
13 January 2018
I can see how they offer news on the markets in my portfolio. Great personalisation!
15 March 2018
Was with another well known exchange but found the spreads to be very expensive and was unable to day trade, so really like Capital.com for their spreads, very competitive.
15 November 2019
Great app! Very much enjoying the analysis of the market according to the important economic events. I really love this charts and drawings to review the markets and upward or downward trends.
gb
Capital.com give consistent updates and regular assistance to members through its specialists staff. I recommend Capital.com to anyone who want to try trading even without trading knowledge.
gb
Try Capital.com
Start trading global markets by creating an account

div.div: Follow us

div.p: CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 75% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money. Please read our Risk Disclosure statement.

Risk warning: transactions with non-deliverable over-the-counter instruments are a risky activity and can bring not only profit but also losses. The size of the potential loss is limited to the size of the deposit. Past profits do not guarantee future profits. Use the training services of our company to understand the risks before you start operations.

Capital Com (UK) Limited is registered in England and Wales with company registration number 10506220. Authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), under register number 793714.
Capital Com SV Investments Limited is regulated by Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (CySEC) under license number 319/17.

Closed joint-stock company “Capital Com Bel” is regulated by National Bank of the Republic of Belarus, registered by Minsk city executive committee 19.03.2019 with company registration number 193225654. Address: 220030, the Republic of Belarus, Minsk, Internatsionalnaya street 36/1, office 823. Certificate of inclusion in the register of forex companies No. 16 dated 16.04.2019.
